snippet: Sudan’s archaeological record is pivotal to understanding the history of Africa itself, experts say, and a wave of new discoveries may be adding crucial new information.
abstract: Khartoum Journal; experts say Sudan’s archaeological record is pivotal to understanding history of Africa itself, and wave of new discoveries may be adding crucial new information; country's historical importance has long been overshadowed by Egypt, but Sudan has more pyramids, though they are smaller and not as old.
lead_paragraph: Sudan’s archaeological record is pivotal to understanding the history of Africa itself, experts say, and a wave of new discoveries may be adding crucial new information.

headline.seo: In Sudan, Archaeologists Unearth Ancient Kingdoms
headline.main: Ancient Kingdoms in Land of War
headline.print_headline: Ancient Kingdoms in Land of War
